headline: World awaits threatened attack on Iran
content: Defiant rhetoric in Tehran on Army Day with Iranian president praising military strength and the ‘shattering’ of Israel.

headline: Iran sends drones, missiles towards Israel
content: Iran’s semi-official Tasnim news agency reports that the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps has launched drones and missiles towards Israel.

headline: UN chief says Middle East ‘on the brink’
content: Iran’s ambassador to the UN said its attack on Israel ‘was entirely in the exercise of Iran’s inherent right to self-defence’.

headline: Tesla's Strong Financial Results
content: Tesla has released its latest financial results, which show a significant increase in revenue and profits.

headline: Amazon's Workforce Expansion Plan
content: Amazon has announced a new plan to expand its workforce by 100,000 jobs.

headline: Meta's Quarterly Revenue Decline
content: Meta has reported its first quarterly revenue decline since going public in 2012.

headline: Supreme Court Reverses Roe v. Wade
content: The Supreme Court has overturned Roe v. Wade, the landmark ruling that legalized abortion nationwide.

headline: House Passes Assault Weapons Ban
content: The House of Representatives has passed a bill to ban assault weapons.

headline: Senate Confirms Ketanji Brown Jackson
content: The Senate has voted to confirm Ketanji Brown Jackson as the first Black woman to serve on the Supreme Court.

headline: Federal Reserve Raises Interest Rates
content: The Federal Reserve has raised interest rates by 0.75 percentage points in an effort to combat inflation.

headline: Google's New AI Chip Announcement
content: Google has announced the development of a new AI chip that is expected to be significantly faster and more efficient than existing chips.

headline: Apple's Latest iPhone Release
content: Apple has released its latest iPhone, which is expected to be available in stores next month.

headline: Microsoft's Partnership with Google
content: Microsoft has announced a new partnership with Google to develop cloud computing solutions.

headline: Elon Musk's Acquisition of Twitter
content: Elon Musk has acquired Twitter for 44 Billion dollars

headline: Biden's Climate Plan Announcement
content: President Biden has announced a new plan to address the climate crisis.
